variables.name: totalQcPassed
variables.description: Total number of reads that are QC pass (according to flag bit 0x200)

variables.name: mapped
variables.description: Number of reads which are mapped, i.e., 0x4 bit not set

variables.name: secondaryAlignments
variables.description: Number of reads which are secondary, i.e. 0x100 bit set

variables.name: supplementary
variables.description: Number of reads which are supplementary, i.e., 0x800 bit set

variables.name: duplicates
variables.description: Number of reads which are duplicates, i.e., 0x400 bit set

variables.name: pairedInSequencing
variables.description: Number of reads which are paired in sequencing, i.e., 0x1 bit set

variables.name: read1
variables.description: Number of reads which are read1, i.e., both 0x1 and 0x40 bits set

variables.name: read2
variables.description: Number of reads which are read2, i.e., both 0x1 and 0x80 bits set

variables.name: properlyPaired
variables.description: Number of reads which are properly paired, i.e., both 0x1 and 0x2 bits set and 0x4 bit not set

variables.name: selfAndMateMapped
variables.description: Number of reads with itself and mate mapped, i.e., 0x1 bit set and neither 0x4 nor 0x8 bits set

variables.name: singletons
variables.description: Number of reads which are singletons, i.e., both 0x1 and 0x8 bits set and bit 0x4 not set

variables.name: mateMappedToDiffChr
variables.description: Number of reads with mate mapped to a different chr, i.e., 0x1 bit set and neither 0x4 nor 0x8 bits set and MRNM not equal to RNAME

variables.name: diffChrMapQ5
variables.description: Number of reads with mate mapped to a different chr (mapQ>=5), i.e.,  0x1 bit set and neither 0x4 nor 0x8 bits set and MRNM not equal to RNAME and MAPQ >= 5Reads QC failed
